titleStmt.title: A discourse of the glory to which God hath called believers by Jesus Christ delivered in some sermons out of the I Pet. 5 Chap. 10 ver. : together with an annexed letter / both by that eminent and worthy minister of the Gospel, Mr. Jonathan Mitchil, late pastor to the church at Cambridge in New-England.
titleStmt.author: Mitchel, Jonathan, 1624-1668.
Collins, John, 1632?-1687.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
